FdoSearchCondition Class Reference

#include <SearchCondition.h>

Inherits FdoFilter.

Inherited by FdoComparisonCondition, FdoGeometricCondition, FdoInCondition, and FdoNullCondition.

Inheritance diagram for FdoSearchCondition:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

FdoSearchCondition is an abstract base class. FdoSpatialCondition, FdoComparisonCondition, FdoLikeCondition, FdoInCondition, and FdoNullCondition derive from the FdoSearchCondition class.
